remarks: A 1-dim subspace (atom) of a left module or left vector space is nonzero.  ( ~ atne0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
lsatn0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatn0.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatn0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsatn0.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
lsatn0 $p |- ( ph -> U =/= { .0. } ) $.
